job_desc: As a Data Migration Specialist   you will support our conversion process  You will be involved in communication with customers to identify   extract and collect data required for conversion from customers  PIMs to IDEXX Animana   You will convert collected data using software  scripts and tools following best practices  IDEXX Animana is an intuitive  cloud based practice information management solution that allows veterinarians and practice managers to access patient data anytime  anywhere  simply with access to the internet  We build a product that matters in the lives of pets  people  and livestock  We are key European software for the IDEXX software strategy  Visit https   careers idexx com us en software to learn more about Software at IDEXX  Animana is a team of 25  Full Stack Developers  QAs   Data Technicians  Data Engineers  UI Designer and Scrum Master  We offer a strong culture of learning  growth  career development  disciplined Software Development Life Cycle execution in a flexible work life balance environment  We also speak 16 languages across the team  but English is KEY  Our technology stack   Java  Spring  MongoDB  AWS   Angular  TypeScript  HTML5  Javascript In This Role   You will partner with the Customer Facing Organization  CFO  to support customer onboarding   You will proactively identify missing information in the customer requests raised by CFO and will help them to enrich requests with additional requirements   You will create and support customer facing and internal documentation   Your day to day work will be focused on the execution of data services tasks based on the prioritized backlog  migration of data from different DBs to Animana using existing tools improvement of the migration logic and tools improve data quality automate and execute custom requests other small tasks  What You Will Need to Succeed  You l ove the data and solving challenges related to it   You h ave a good understanding of data integrity and data modeling   Y ou have experience with relational databases and Structured Query Language  SQL    MongoDB and Python    You are proficient in Excel    You are familiar with Git   Jenkins   Linux Unix   and Talend data steward    Why IDEXX We re proud of the work we do  because our work matters  An innovation leader in every industry we serve  we follow our Purpose and Guiding Principles to help pet owners worldwide keep their companion animals healthy and happy  to ensure safe drinking water for billions  and to help farmers protect livestock and poultry from diseases  We have customers in over 175 countries and a global workforce of over 9 000 talented people  So  what does that mean for you  We enrich the livelihoods of our employees with a positive and respectful work culture that embraces challenges and encourages learning and discovery  At IDEXX  you will be supported by competitive compensation  incentives  and benefits while enjoying purposeful work that drives improvement   Let s pursue what matters together   IDEXX values a diverse workforce and workplace and strongly encourages women  people of color  LGBTQ individuals  people with disabilities  members of ethnic minorities  foreign born residents  and veterans to apply   IDEXX is an equal opportunity employer  Applicants will not be discriminated against because of race  color  creed  sex  sexual orientation  gender identity or expression  age  religion  national origin  citizenship status  disability  ancestry  marital status  veteran status  medical condition  or any protected category prohibited by local  state  or federal laws

Job Title Data Designer Job Description In this role  you have the opportunity to Unleash the power of design  data and AI to deliver value to people when it matters most  caring for their health  Work in a highly talented team  shape the data and AI design capability  work on exciting challenges in healthcare domain  You will bring the Data Design competence to the next level by leveraging data as design material in the creative process and impact people s health through meaningful data and AI enabled propositions  With your hands on design and programming skills  you bring in a new view on and build exciting new propositions for our users and customers through visualizing and synthesizing on data  We are looking for a Data Design expert that can run projects in the team with high level of independence  This role can be for a computer or data scientist with clear experience in a creative  design environment  able to provide portfolio proving affinity with the design field  On the other hand  this role can be for a UX designer with clear affinity with data  who is able to work hands on with data and program oneself  You are responsible for Building differentiating propositions encompassing data and AI that are relevant to our end users in the healthcare domain Gather  structure  visualize to translate data into insights Support other designers in embedding data and AI into their design practice Bridge the design capabilities with data science AI capabilities Building a toolset and repeatable way of working for data enabled design You are a part of The Data Enabled Design team  a group of data designers with expertise on data visualization  user experience research and prototyping with around data and AI  The Data Enabled Design team is part of global 400  design community and working on both business and research driven projects  To succeed in this role  you should have the following skills and experience University degree  WO HBO  in Design or Computer Science  or related  Hands on programming skills  e g  React  NodeJS  D3  Experience in creating strong design concepts Knowledge and experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence is a pre Independently act in both innovation projects as business projects English verbal and writing In return  we offer you A path towards your most rewarding career  Succeeding in this role in a complex environment will open many doors for your long term career  in other areas in Philips or otherwise  We also believe that we are at our best as a company when you are at yours as a person  Thus  we offer competitive health benefits  a flexible work schedule and access to local well being focused activities  Why should you join Philips  Working at Philips is more than a job  It s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work  focused on improving 2 5 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum  Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways  Learn more by watching this video  To find out more about what it s like working for Philips at a personal level  visit the Working at Philips page on our career website  where you can read stories from our employee blog  Once there you can also learn about our recruitment process  or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions   LI EU

Prologis is the global leader in logistics real estate  We own  manage and develop high quality properties in the world s most vibrant centers of commerce  approximately 72 million square meters in 19 countries  Some of the world s largest brands  e g   Amazon  BMW  DHL  FedEx  Pepsi  turn to us because they know an efficient supply chain will make their businesses run better  and a strategic relationship with Prologis will create competitive advantage  As the top ranked U S  company and sixth overall among the Global 100 Most Sustainable Corporations in the World  we take our global footprint seriously  Job Title  Data analyst  Intern Company  Prologis Do you want to play a role in global commerce  Prologis seeks an  under graduate level intern passionate about data analytics and real estate to help us advance our internal reporting  This individual will work within the Strategic Capital team and have direct exposure to Fund Management  During the 12 week project  you will be contributing to a specific initiative that will impact the business  quarterly processes on a global scale  What s needed in order to do that  Demonstrated ability and interest in data analytics Learn to acquire data from Cloud sources Upgrade a recurring report by automating the data processes Create alternative ways to present a complicated set of real estate information Support the team s digitalization efforts Communicate data insights through visualizations Tell us if you re ready   Current academic enrollment in an  under graduate program Preferred majors  math  computer science  real estate  engineering or finance Proficient in MS Office applications  especially with Excel Experience with Power Query  SQL and OData protocol  or willingness to learn Ability to work with remote teams  as necessary Solid communication skills in English  verbal and written  Attention to detail and commitment to professionalism and integrity Creative mindset and willingness to take on new challenges  LI LMP People First Each of us working at Prologis plays an essential role in the enduring success of our company  We value people who are decisive  courageous and adaptable  While we are one company  locations and departments operate with autonomy and accountability  Individuals take the initiative here  When you join Prologis  you work shoulder to shoulder with some of the top talent in the industry to do the best work of your career  Every employee belongs  Every employee contributes  Employees advance their careers here  As a successful global enterprise  Prologis has never lost sight of what matters most  our strong belief that our people are the most important part of our business  And because of that  we provide a generous total rewards package and take a lot of time to focus on quality management and leadership development  People come first here  Employment Type  Full time Location  Amsterdam  Netherlands Additional Locations

Den Haag HBO Jaarcontract met uitzicht op vast dienstverband 2 675 tot 4 070 Wil je werken aan statistieken voor de Nederlandse industrie met een hoge nieuwswaarde  Heb jij boekhoudkennis en ben je analytisch sterk  Dan is deze functie geknipt voor jou  Ben jij er klaar voor  Jouw uitdaging Je gaat gegevens analyseren van bedrijven die maandelijks  per kwartaal en jaarlijks worden gepubliceerd  Je houdt je bezig met de volgende werkzaamheden  Beoordelen of de omzetgegevens van bedrijven logisch aansluiten bij eerdere cijfers en zonodig zoeken naar een verklaring voor de verschillen  Beoordelen van de financiële gegevens over opbrengsten  kosten en werkgelegenheid voor de jaarstatistiek en hiervoor zonodig de winst  en verliesrekeningen raadplegen  Zien van verbanden tussen de verschillende gegevens  zoals het verband tussen omzet en inkoopwaarden  Beantwoorden van vragen van bedrijven of contact met ze opnemen over de inhoud van ontvangen gegevens  Daarnaast krijg je de mogelijkheid om bij te dragen aan projecten om het proces te optimaliseren  Zo ziet je team eruit Blijf leren Alle medewerkers volgen regelmatig trainingen om bij te blijven of te verdiepen  Dat doen we bij onze CBS Academy  Gezelligheid Op kantoor samen lunchen met collega s  af en toe een borrel of samen op stap  Én in december een kerstdiner  Team 18 gedreven collega s  prima samenwerking  ook met andere teams  en oog voor verbetering van het werkproces  Statistieken We maken statistieken over de economische ontwikkelingen van bedrijven binnen industrie  energie en bouw  Je gaat werken bij de sector Bedrijvenstatistieken in Den Haag  bij het team Industrie  Energie en Bouw  dat bestaat uit 18 enthousiaste collega s  Het team maakt aansprekende statistieken over de economische ontwikkelingen binnen de industrie  energie en de bouw en functionele statistieken van de bouw  Onze cijfers dragen bij aan het BBP We werken in hybride vorm thuis en op kantoor  als dat mogelijk is i v m  de situatie rondom COVID 19  In je team maak je daarover afspraken  Je spreekt bijvoorbeeld af hoeveel dagen je op het CBS werkt  of dat vaste dagen zijn  hele of halve dagen  Wie jij bent Je bent een enthousiaste en leergierige collega met gevoel voor humor en hebt  een aantoonbaar hbo werk  en denkniveau  bij voorkeur in een bedrijfseconomische richting  goed ontwikkelde boekhoudkundige As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

 90  accuracy   including basic troubleshooting with the ability to utilize proprietary tools  Willingness and flexibility to work in shifts  Job summary All Amazon teams and businesses  from Prime job_desc: The role  We are challenging how live sport and entertainment is delivered and consumed   From the world s biggest sporting events  to the best local sport  to award winning original programming   our audiences enjoy a 24 7 offering of the best live and non live content across the ELEVEN Group  At a time of significant growth for our company and in continuing to deliver industry changing developments  we want you to help provide world class entertainment to the global fan community by strengthening ELEVEN s global sports platform and live streaming technology  We re now looking for a thoughtful and open minded Data Analyst  Sitting in the marketing team  you ll drive how data is leveraged in solving business problems within our cross functional teams  which comprise staff from across our functions and regions  You ll help consult with these stakeholders in defining what data is critical for our success  help set relevant success metrics  and shape our future revenue growth through data insights and effectively communicating possible solutions  Together with the Senior Marketing and Communications Manager  you ll help manage stakeholders based on their experience by prioritising business impact  efficiently adapting to business needs  and managing expectations accordingly  You ll also use your deep practical understanding of the data  workflows  methods  and tooling to autonomously drive dashboarding  analysis and reporting within your scope  At ELEVEN we re committed to hiring the person who we believe is the strongest candidate for the position  However  research indicates that women frequently only apply for roles where they believe they satisfy 100  of the role requirements  We don t want anyone to feel discouraged in applying for any of our vacancies  so if you believe you meet 60  or more of the criteria  we definitely encourage you to apply  What you ll do  Support the design of key metrics that quantify the success of our initiatives Organise and present your findings in a meaningful way to make sure your stakeholders are able to make the right decision Build dashboards that help internal and external stakeholders understand the performance of their business segment  and identify action points Design and implement decision making tools that enable data driven decision making Support our teams in planning and forecasting with automated reporting Work across our teams to build a joined up view of our customer lifecycles Be the  go to  data person across our teams for questions related to commercial and campaign performance  customer behaviour  and more Monitor data and information management processes to ensure data quality and consistency You are already a great candidate if you have   2 3 years of generating insights from large and complex digital data sets Deep familiarity with analytical and visualisation tools including SQL  Google Big Query  Google Analytics  Google Search Console  Firebase  Google Data Studio  and Google Tag Manager  Any experience with additional tools such as Youbora  Tableau  or Qlik is a bonus  The ability to deliver and communicate insights and reporting to commercial  technology  and product team audiences as well as external stakeholders Familiarity with measuring incrementality via the use of benchmarks  control groups  and statistical modelling Basic data science experience including modelling using R or Python And even better if you have   Worked with an international digital business whose revenue streams include subscriptions  pay per view  data av monetisation  and or sponsorship Proven experience with analytics across multiple digital platforms  including apps  smart TV  and games consoles Scripting experience in Google Sheets   Excel and creating workflow automations A good understanding of the global sports and media landscape Awareness and experience of working in an experimentation culture Opportunities you ll enjoy Be part of a company fundamentally transforming the live streaming landscape in sports and beyond on a global scale  Having the freedom to pitch  implement  and execute new ideas Flexibility over your holidays  If you want to work on Netherlands public holidays  that s fine   just take what suits you best from 33 days annual leave Flexibility where you work We have a company culture like no other  About ELEVEN ELEVEN is a global network of LIVE and non live sport and entertainment content   from the world s biggest sports events to the best longtail sport  to award winning original programming   The state of the art technology available via our newly launched global sports platform ELEVENSPORTS com  previously MyCujoo tv   which allows anyone to stream from a device as simple as a mobile phone  revolutionised football broadcasting  Our crazy idea to transform every single match into a live broadcast became the world s largest live football streaming platform  With an initial focus on niche premium and longtail sports  our ambitions are now even bigger   In 2020 we also delivered our newest product  MyCujoo Live Services  MCLS   a highly scalable live streaming solution built on the tech stack powering ELEVENSPORTS com  Developed for rights owners in sports and beyond  MCLS equips content creators with the technology and tools to provide their fans with the most powerful  authentic  and engaging live streaming experiences

job_desc: We envision every building in the Netherlands having a virtual twin  a predictive digital twin  whose construction and material behaviour has been modelled and which  thanks to continuous real time data feeds from innovative sensors  monitors its status and predicts itself when maintenance or repair will be required  Can you imagine what would be possible if we had this information from several buildings and managed assets for the replacement and renovation of buildings and infrastructure using this information  WHAT WILL BE YOUR ROLE  You will work as a scientist digitalisation   data science with a strong focus on BIM and Linked Data  As a scientist  you make data processes and workflows transparent and develop data architectures  You apply your knowledge of open standards  security  applications and application landscapes  and offer advice on how information can be stored  accessed  and reused in the right way  As a scientist  you write or co write research proposals and scientific articles  At TNO Buildings  Infrastructure   Maritime  BI M   we work on tangible solutions to major social issues for a safe and sustainable built environment  This is no mean feat  considering the increasing burden on the road and waterway network  the enormous housing challenge  and emission issues during a time of major energy and climate transitions  Digitalisation is making an increasingly important contribution to solving these issues in the Building and Infrastructure sector HOW DO YOU WANT TO CONTRIBUTE TO TOMORROW S WORLD  HOW BIG CAN YOUR IMPACT BE  COME AND WORK AT TNO AND ENVISION IT WHAT WE EXPECT FROM YOU You have the skills to  independently  convert ideas into working prototypes of tools or products and guide others to develop their ideas into marketable products  You are inquisitive  objective  and verbally expressive  You can work well together in a diverse and international team  You have knowledge of common data standards  such as IFC  BCF  etc     especially their limitations  Furthermore  being able to program with various programming languages  JAVA  Python  etc   is recommended  Other knowledge and skills you bring to TNO  A university degree with a technical background with a specialisation in BIM IT  You have extensive experience with and knowledge of  open  BIM  You have knowledge of building practice  from the design phase to the use phase  You have knowledge of Semantic Linked Data or are eager to learn more about it soon  You have experience with or knowledge of  BIM SparQL  JSON  voxels  3D geometry  and server side computing  machine learning   Practical knowledge of machine learning libraries  such as TensorFlow  Keras  sklearn  Caffe  Torch  is an advantage  WHAT YOU LL GET IN RETURN Challenging and varied work with a real impact  And plenty of opportunities as  at TNO  you are in charge of shaping your career  We offer a gross monthly salary between   3 700   and   5 800    based on your knowledge and experience   8  holiday pay  a 13th month bonus of 8 33  and a flex budget  5 58      180   In addition  you will be given every opportunity to develop yourself  Perhaps you would like to grow your career in the direction of commerce or consultancy  Or would you like to become a project manager  Immerse yourself in sustainable innovations  Or carve out a career as a technical expert  TNO offers optional employee benefits  enabling you to tailor your benefits package to match your personal situation  You may also expect  A good pension scheme  Travel allowance  Possibility of a permanent contract  An extremely professional  innovative working environment where colleagues are leading experts in their field  28 days annual leave and 5 compensation days under the reduction in working hours scheme  ATV  arbeidstijdverkorting  on a full time basis  Great social events with your team and other TNO colleagues  That s how you will get to know a lot of people really quickly  Flexible working hours and the possibility of working from home  The opportunity to attend courses  workshops and conferences  and to receive training and coaching based on your needs  Extensive relocation package for international candidates  Read more about tailoring your benefits package  TNO AS AN EMPLOYER At TNO  we innovate for a healthier  safer and more sustainable life  And for a strong economy  Since 1932  we have been making knowledge and technology available for the common good  We find each other in wonder and ingenuity  We are driven to push boundaries  There is all the space and support for your talent and ambition  You work with people who will challenge you  who inspire you and want to learn from you  Our state of the art facilities are there to realize your vision  What you do at TNO matters  impact makes the difference  Because with every innovation you contribute to tomorrow s world  Read more about TNO as an employer  THE SELECTION PROCESS Please apply before May 9  2022  The selection process comprises two interview rounds  The preliminary interview takes place on May 17  In a final meeting we will discuss the terms of employment and your tailored benefits package  We aim to finalize the entire process within four weeks  The selection process may include an online assessment and a reference check  HAS THIS JOB OPENING SPARKED YOUR INTEREST  Then we d like to hear from you  Please contact us for more information about the job or the selection process  To apply  please upload your CV and covering letter using the  apply now  button  Recruiter  Lara DimitrovskiMobile phone   31  0 6 507 40690LinkedIn  https   www linkedin com in laradimitrovski  Hiring manager  Arlette Pikaart Accept cookies to view this video or embedded content  ACCEPT ALL COOKIES Note that applications via email and third party applications are not taken into consideration

In Nederland doneren honderdduizenden mensen bloed bij Sanquin  de Nederlandse bloedbank en hét instituut voor kennis en innovatie op gebied van bloed  Die donaties worden getest en verwerkt  en vinden uiteindelijk hun weg naar patiënten wereldwijd  In die keten speelt Data service management een cruciale rol  Het Data services team verzorgt samen met zijn haar collega s de management informatie  die nodig is om data gedreven werken te faciliteren en onderbouwde besluitvorming mogelijk te maken  Zo zorgen jij en Sanquin ervoor dat patiënten 24 7 kunnen rekenen op veilig bloed   Hoe ziet je dag eruit   Als Data specialist bij Sanquin werkt je mee aan het onderhouden en uitbreiden van het Sanquin datawarehouse  Hierin staan de gegevens van de belangrijkste applicaties  die bij Sanquin gebruikt en is de basis voor een grote hoeveelheid BI overzichten  rapporten en dashboards m b t  de bedrijfsprocessen   De ene dag ben je bezig met het aanpassen van het datawarehouse  een andere dag ben je in gesprek met de business voor een nieuw BI overzicht  Ook neem je deel aan nieuwe projecten voor het ontsluiten van data uit nieuwe bronnen  Het beheer van toegang en autorisaties voor de gebruikers van Business Objects maakt deel uit van je werkzaamheden  Je zorgt er ook voor dat via schedules automatisch de ETL jobs voor het updaten van de diverse datastromen uitgevoerd worden  Waar lever jij meerwaarde  Onderhouden  uitbreiden  optimaliseren en documenteren van het bestaande Business Intelligence platform op basis van SAP Business Objects  Uitbreiding van het datawarehouse door het verder ontsluiten van de bedrijfsapplicaties en andere nieuwe bronsystemen  Ontwikkeling van Universes en Web Intelligence overzichten d m v  Business Objects tools  Het ondersteunen in het gebruik en het verder opzetten en uitbouwen van de diverse rapportages en overige relevante stuurinformatie voor het management  in het bijzonder die van de Bloedbank divisie  Het optimaliseren van business intelligence processen en de inrichting van Business Objects om het gebruik  de effectiviteit en de efficiëntie daarvan verder te verbeteren  Sparringpartner voor MT bij gebruik van BI en ontwikkeling van nieuwe toepassingen daarvan  Whats in it for you   Je wordt een nog steviger en veelzijdiger Data Specialist  De veelheid aan activiteiten in de complexe organisatie van Sanquin maken Business Intelligence uitdagend  In beginsel is jouw aandachtsgebied de Bloedbank organisatie  maar in de toekomst word je voor ingezet voor alle bedrijfsonderdelen  Er spelen grote veranderprogramma s waar jij vanuit het team Business Intelligence ook een bijdrage aan levert en een adviesrol in hebt  Je komt dus niet in een gespreid bedje terecht en krijgt volop kans om te helpen bouwen en inrichten   Marktconform salaris  eindejaarsuitkering  13e maand bij volledig kalenderjaar  Een ruim aanbod van goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals 27 verlofdagen  o b v  fulltime dienstverband   reiskostenvergoeding  een eigen ontwikkelbudget  uitgebreid opleidingspakket en een pensioenregeling bij Pensioenfonds Zorg   Welzijn  Met verve vervul jij jouw rol als Business Intelligence Specialist  Je bent een enthousiaste team player  met een proactieve en verbeteringsgerichte houding  Wat breng je mee  Afgeronde HBO WO opleiding  en minimaal 5 jaar werkervaring  Ervaring met beheer en of ontwikkeling van IT systemen en databases  Heeft een analytische geest  is vasthoudend en oplossingsgericht  Gedegen kennis van eProgesa en de bloedbank processen is een pré  maar geen must  Bereidheid om opgeleid te worden tot BI Specialist in Business Objects door opleiding in het ontwikkelen in  ETL  tools zoals SAP Data Services Designer  BO Information Design Tool en het gebruik en toepassen van de Web Intelligence cliënt  Kennis van de Engelse en Nederlandse taal in woord en geschrift  Goed ontwikkelde schriftelijke en mondelinge communicatieve vaardigheden  Je kunt gemakkelijk je weg vinden en houd je goed staande in complexe organisaties  Enthousiast geworden   Wil je meer weten over de functie van Data Specialist  Neem dan contact op met Erik Eversdijk  Corporate Recruiter ICT  a i    email protected   Wil jij jouw skills inzetten om levensreddend werk mogelijk te maken  Solliciteer dan via www werkenbijsanquin nl De gesprekken vinden plaats via Teams  Startdatum in overleg  maar wat ons betreft zo snel mogelijk  Een pre employmentscreening en   of Verklaring Omtrent Gedrag  VOG  kunnen deel uitmaken van de procedure   Acquisitie wordt niet op prijs gesteld  Sanquin aanvaardt geen ongevraagde hulp van bureaus voor deze vacature  Toegestuurde cv s  in welke vorm dan ook  door bemiddelingsbureaus aan enige medewerker van Sanquin zonder geldige schriftelijke zoekopdracht  worden gezien als eigendom van Sanquin waarvoor op geen enkele wijze een vergoeding verschuldigd is

What you ll do  Helping our internal customers derive insigths from data by communicating data in compelling ways through visualizations and data reports Leading the front end development of aesthetically pleasing and user friendly data reports and web applications  Empowering data stakeholders by building reports yourself and enabling teams to make their own reports  Identifying further opportunities to help stakeholders take more advantage of data through reports  Supporting your internal user community through clear and up to date documentation  workshops  and trainings  Defining key performance indicators and product metrics  Evaluating data quality and driving improvements when needed  Helping others to persuasively communicate insights through visual and understandable presentations to both technical and non technical audiences  You will be working in the Data Unit  a multidisciplinary  open minded  and dynamic team of software engineers  data engineers  and data scientists contributing to advancing data as a discipline within TomTom  In this team you will shape the future of TomTom by helping teams to take better decisions using data Are you focused on outcomes  a self starter  and have demonstrated success in helping companies derive value from their data through compelling data visualizations and reports  Then this is your perfect opportunity  What you ll need  Passion for Data Visualization  Experience as a Front End Developer or Data Analyst  ideally at a product focused software company  Web front end development skills and tooling such as SQL and JavaScript  Experience working with data reporting and visualisation tools such as Power BI or Tableau  Strong communication and data storytelling skills  To be a self starter and take ownership of your domain  Eagerness to develop your skills  It s great if you also have  Experience in UX design or UX research What we offer   Competitive compensation package    Work flexibility program  Working   TomTom    work from both home and the office Home office benefits  with a setup budget and a monthly allowance to support Chance to work abroad for 90 calendar days in select countries and states Holiday package that includes your birthday off and a volunteering day per year Bring your ideas and innovation to life during our Hackathon  DevDays  and more Take on learning opportunities   internal programs  O Reilly and LinkedIn learning The opportunity to join one of the few top tech location specialists and have an impact on the future of mobility Be part of a supportive  inclusive  and global culture  After you apply 1  First call  If your application matches the role  then it s time to put a voice to the name  We ll call you to set up an interview  2  First interview  In this interview  we want to know more about you   what excites you about location technology and how can you help us solve global challenges  3  Online assessment  We ll set you an assignment   use your expertise to show us what you ve got  4  Second interview  We ll dive into your potential role  showing you how you ll fit into your team and contribute to our vision  5  The final decision  Cue the fireworks  because we ll start the onboarding

job_desc: Energiewacht is werkzaam in Overijssel  Friesland  Drenthe  Groningen  Utrecht  Noord Holland  Flevoland en Gelderland  In totaal werken er circa 1 000 medewerkers verspreid over 14 vestigingen  Onze organisatie is nog volop in ontwikkeling en er is een grote gedrevenheid om de ambities te realiseren  Wij zijn dan ook een vernieuwende organisatie met een open bedrijfscultuur waarin wij op een professionele  menselijke en collegiale manier met elkaar samenwerken  Kwaliteit  werkplezier en persoonlijke ontwikkeling van onze medewerkers vinden wij dan ook erg belangrijk  Je gaat werken voor een solide bedrijf waar je werkt in de snel veranderende én interessante wereld van Energie en Duurzaamheid  Stap jij in deze rijdende trein Bij Energiewacht in Assen is een vacature ontstaan voor een  Proces en Data Analist  32 38 uur  Spreekt Business Intelligence jou aan en krijg je energie om de diepte in te gaan  Kan jij data omzetten naar adequate management informatie  Wil jij werken in de wereld van Duurzaamheid en Energie In de functie van Proces   Data Analist houd jij je bezig met procesoptimalisaties vanuit de business  Denk hierbij aan het optimaliseren van processen zoals de benuttingsgraad en logistieke processen  Hierbij ga je aan de slag met ad hoc analyses die vanuit de operatie worden gesignaleerd  Je bent constant bezig om de bestaande processen naar een hoger niveau te tillen  Hierbij is het belangrijk dat je communicatief sterk bent en in staat bent om vanuit data verbeteringen te signaleren  Onderstaande verantwoordelijkheidsgebieden zijn onderdeel van deze functie  Periodiek leveren van KPI dashboards aan de operatie  Op basis van jouw analyses aanbevelingen opstellen voor het MT Analyses leveren op basis van productiviteits  en kwaliteitsvraagstukken  Bij het uitvoeren van jouw werkzaamheden ben je veel in contact met collega s van verschillende disciplines  Zo heb je veelvuldig contact met de manager van Proces   Logistiek  de afdelingen Finance   Control  Commercie en vanuit de operatie met afdelingsmanagers  vestigingsleiders en tactisch planners  Ook werk je samen met vertegenwoordigers van andere service partners ten aanzien van KPI definitie en rapportage  Tijdens jouw inwerkprocedure bij Energiewacht maak je kennis met meerdere locaties in Noordoost Nederland  elk heeft zijn eigen kantoor  Hierbij ga je meelopen  leer je de processen kennen en word je begeleid door collega s die jou meenemen in het werkveld  Wat vragen wij Je hebt een achtergrond in Business Intelligence  procesoptimalisaties en LEAN Green BeltErvaring en natuurlijke interesse in data analyse  Je bent vaardig met tools zoals Microsoft Office Advanced Excel en Advanced PowerBI Je kan goed samenwerken met collega s van verschillende afdelingen en je bent in staat om uitstekend stakeholdermanagement toe te passenWat bieden wij  Jouw werkomgeving bij ons bedrijf is een plezierige  afwisselende werkomgeving met enthousiaste en behulpzame collega s Een dienstverband voor 32 of 38 uur  Wij bieden jou een contract voor de periode van een jaar   Een salaris van minimaal  3 495   en maximaal  4 237   bruto op basis van een fulltime dienstverband  Jouw arbeidsvoorwaarden zijn geregeld in de CAO Metaal en Techniek  waaronder bijv  25 vakantiedagen  13 adv dagen bij een fulltime dienstverband en een pensioenregeling bij PMT Jouw arbeidsvoorwaarden worden aangevuld met onze eigen bedrijfsregelingen  zoals bijv  reiskostenvergoeding  een telefoon en laptop van de zaak   Energiewacht biedt diverse leuke extra s zoals The Data Science team at OLX Europe is responsible for building algorithmic solutions to facilitate transactions between millions of buyers and sellers across 8 countries  Among several other things  we are developing personalisation technologies and optimisation strategies that have a direct impact on OLX s users as well as the company s bottom line  This is a domain filled with interesting challenges as OLX facilitates a broad range of transactions including second hand goods such as cars  electronics and furniture  real estate  and services such as jobs which all contain user generated content that is consumed by machine learning applications at scale   You will lead the Data Science team working in the areas of search  recommender systems  as well as trust and safety in using state of the art Data Science and ML methods to improve the customer experience  The teams have already in most cases mature ML products in production with millions of users per month and a track record of success stories  We are looking for someone that will help us take this to the next level  creating best in class models that are tailored to the specific needs of our different verticals and customer segments   What you will be doing Lead the parts of the Data Science team that work on Buyer and Trust related efforts Partner with Heads of Product and Heads of Technology to solve customer problems and create excellent customer experiences  For example  improve the search and recommendation engines to help our buyers find relevant and inspiring content  and the moderation algorithms to keep our platform free from content that violates our terms of service  e g   illegal  fraudulent  inappropriate  etc   Work with Product Analytics to track the KPIs of different ML use cases and measure the impact for our customers  For example  fine tune KPIs impacted by Search and Recommendations  e g  related to effectiveness  efficiency  engagement  etc  and measure how specific ML models impact them  Partner with the Experimentation team to integrate the KPIs and their proxies to the Experimentation  A B testing  platform  What are we looking for  Experience leading mature technical teams for several years  in the broader area of Data Science and Machine Learning A deep understanding of machine learning techniques and their use in a business context At least 5 years of experience in the data science field with a track record of successful project delivery A strong engineering background with good knowledge of best practices  in Cloud Technologies  Python  SQL  ML infrastructure and pipelines  etc   Experience interacting with senior stakeholders from Product and Technology and co owning significant parts of the product roadmap  Nice to have  Experience in managing projects with diverse cross functional teams and multiple stakeholders  Experience creating ML and Data Products in online retail or online marketplaces  Experience with cloud based platforms and tools  e g   AWS Athena  AWS Sagemaker  AWS Kinesis  or equivalent tools from other cloud providers  What we offer  Competitive compensation and benefits Contributing to the global OLX Group A passionate and diverse team of data scientists spanning several tech hubs and close collaboration with other global teams The opportunity to learn from each other and become better every day Company mobile phone  laptop  MacBook Pro   PC   and other tools you might need What you ll need to know about us Be part of the Prosus universe   the largest consumer internet company in Europe OLX Group is a global product and tech company with over 20 brands   7500 people and one mindset OLX is the world s leading classifieds platform in high growth markets  It s available in more than 40 countries and in over 50 languages Our mission is to make it super easy for people to buy and sell almost anything  boosting local economies We are proud to be different  and we work differently too  We combine the spirit and agility of a start up with the maturity that comes from being part of a 100 year old company We are curious  ambitious and allergic to corporate interference  We improvise  experiment and push each other further  embracing uncertainty and inspiring change If you are as excited as us about this position and our company  we hope you join us  If you d like to learn more about us take a look around our careers page and the OLX Group website  Follow us on Linkedin  Check our OLX Group Engineering Blog and Twitter Tech   We are turning Diversity   Inclusion into our superpower and competitive advantage  We encourage people of all races  ethnicities  disabilities  ages  gender identity or expression  backgrounds and experiences to consider applying for this role

tonen en vooral niet bang zijn om buiten de bestaande kaders naar oplossingen te zoeken  Kortom  je kijkt verder dan jouw change of project en richt je op de optimalisatie van de keten als geheel  Je hebt een gezonde dosis organisatiesensitiviteit maar kunt ook knopen doorhakken  PGGM Vermogensbeheer is momenteel bezig met de implementatie van een Dataplatform  de centrale plek voor data binnen PGGM  Uiteindelijk is het de doelstelling om de gebruikte bronsystemen binnen Vermogensbeheer te koppelen aan dit platform en het zo in te richten dat we meer waarde uit data kunnen halen  Dit platform zal voor meerdere businessprocessen gebruikt worden en met name voor toepassingen  zoals dashboards en klantrapportages  Als Data Developer ben je verantwoordelijk voor de inrichting en het beheer van dit platform  Uiteraard moet de inrichting voldoen aan de kaders vanuit datakwaliteit en data architectuur  Hiervoor is een goede analyse nodig van de business requirements en inzicht in welke mogelijkheden de systemen hiervoor bieden  Het platform wordt gevormd door de systemen Data Virtuality  Snowflake en Collibra  Rolbeschrijving  Je analyseert de requirements vanuit de business  Je adviseert de business over hoe het dataplatform ingezet kan worden in hun processen  Je zet functionele requirements om in technische requirements  Je werkt mee aan het testen en toetsen van het ontwerp en de inrichting  Je ontwikkelt  en implementeert  het datamodel die we hanteren in het dataplatform  zodat dit optimaal aansluit bij de wensen van de business en voldoet aan de gestelde kaders  Je biedt ondersteuning tijdens de acceptatietests van het systeem en de gegevens  Je zorgt ervoor dat de changes op een betrouwbare en voorspelbare manier verlopen  waarbij jij de scherpte bewust opzoekt  Daarbij ben je in staat om complexiteit op effectieve wijze te reduceren en helderheid te creëren bij alle betrokkenen  Je stuurt je projecten niet alleen aan op het proces  maar bent tevens sparringpartner op inhoud voor je team  en projectleden en stakeholders op senior managementniveau Jouw afdeling binnen PGGM In opdracht van onze klanten  pensioenfondsen  verzorgen wij met 1 500 collega s de pensioenadministratie voor 4 4 miljoen Nederlanders  van wie er 2 8 miljoen werken in de sector Zorg en Welzijn  Met een beheerd vermogen van 252 miljard euro  behoren we tot de grootse institutionele beleggers ter wereld  Binnen IT Change werken ongeveer 70 collega s met uitlopende achtergronden  diversiteit  expertise en ervaring  We zijn verantwoordelijk voor het opstellen en uitvoeren van de integrale veranderagenda voor de vermogensbeheerketen van PGGM  Dit doen wij onder andere door de vertaling van het  meer jaarplan Vermogensbeheer naar implementeerbare oplossingen Full time   Amsterdam Hi  we are Mollie        Mollie is on an exciting growth journey  We are on a mission to become the most loved European payment service provider and we are expanding rapidly into new countries  We are the home of  Mollies  who make this place a great place to work and build friends for life  Your opportunity  Mollie is a pioneer in online payments and is one of the fastest growing payment service providers in Europe  We help businesses of all sizes sell and scale more efficiently with a solid and easy to use payment solution  Mollie is continuously looking for ways to innovate while remaining in control  In order to scale the business and the financial management practises with it  Mollie aims to build the financial management practice of the future  data driven and real time insights in financial   business performance and control  This is where you come in  As the Financial Data Analyst you will be responsible for providing the finance department with data driven insights into the financial  business and control position of Mollie  You will be working closely with Mollie s data team   other departmental data analysts  the finance leaders and their teams to provide real time insights into Mollie s performance   What you ll be doing  You will be reporting to the Head of Business Control but supporting the finance leaders providing them with required insights on relevant financials  controls and opportunities  Enhancing a data driven culture and decision making process within all finance teams  i e  merchant operations  financial reporting  credit risk  treasury and tax    Provide insights and support on both financial and business performance and metrics as identified by relevant stakeholders within the finance department  Building and maintaining dashboards to represent relevant financial metrics  Assisting the finance departments with the acquiring and reporting of data insights necessary for supervisory authorities and other partners stakeholders  Identifying improvements in existing processes  procedures and systems based on data analysis data science cases  Identify and implement automation workload improvements specific to the finance department  Responsible for  or highly involved in  data automation oriented projects for the finance department from start to finish  including requirements  scope  architecture  development  releases and maintenance  Ensuring necessary data is documented by relevant stakeholders  and made available for analysis  Meet some of the future colleagues from your team  Islam Abdukhalilov  Team Lead Financial Reporting Ralph Karsten  Head of Financial Reporting Susan  CHRO

  Personal blog  Three of our current Data Process Experts have shared their experiences in their personal blogs  Read how Aji Fatou Badjan and Vera Ogbeine look back at their 1 year anniversary and job_title: TECHNICAL IT TALENTS AT DATA ECOSYSTEMS | SOESTERBERG
job_desc: WHAT WILL BE YOUR ROLE  As part of the relatively new expertise group  Data Ecosystems  you ll work with smart and committed colleagues on challenging projects for industry  logistics  and the domains of defence and security  among others  Your role herein depends on your expertise and interests  As a developer  you ll dive into the code  as an architect  you ll design the contours of complex IT landscapes  Everything you do is supported by sound research and the latest scientific insights  This gives you the chance to be a true pioneer and innovator in your field  Do you have a technical background  Would you like to be the link between TNO and the outside world or do you prefer managing projects  Then opt for a role as consultant or project leader  Diversity is guaranteed  Whatever role you step into  we can help with this    you re guaranteed to have an impact on the future of data sharing  Curious to know what TNO is already doing in this area  For an example  have a look at our contribution to the Netherlands AI Coalition for responsible data sharing  or the Smart Connected Supplier Network  which manufacturing companies can use to share data HOW DO YOU WANT TO CONTRIBUTE TO TOMORROW S WORLD  HOW BIG CAN YOUR IMPACT BE  COME AND WORK AT TNO AND ENVISION IT WHAT WE EXPECT FROM YOU Conducting scientific research while working on relevant practical applications in partnership with clients and other organisations is something that excites you  We give you a lot of freedom to organise your work in your own way  Needless to say  this freedom comes with a high level of responsibility  You are someone who is comfortable working independently and looking for information on your own  while at the same time keeping in touch with your colleagues spread throughout the country  Other knowledge and skills you bring to TNO  A master s degree or work experience in a relevant field  such as computer science  business information systems  business informatics  technical business administration  or industrial engineering  A deep sense of wonder in relation to the technical side of IT  The drive and potential to develop  further  in one of the following roles  developer  architect  project leader  or consultant  WHAT YOU LL GET IN RETURN Challenging and varied work with a real impact  And plenty of opportunities as  at TNO  you are in charge of shaping your career  We offer a gross monthly salary between  3000   and  4500    based on your knowledge and experience   8  holiday pay  a 13th month bonus of 8 33  and a flex budget  5 58      180   In addition  you will be given every opportunity to develop yourself  Perhaps you would like to grow your career in the direction of commerce or consultancy  Or would you like to become a project manager  Immerse yourself in sustainable innovations  Or carve out a career as a technical expert  TNO offers optional employee benefits  enabling you to tailor your benefits package to match your personal situation  You may also expect  An extremely professional  innovative working environment where colleagues are leading experts in their field  28 days annual leave and 5 compensation days under the reduction in working hours scheme  ATV  arbeidstijdverkorting  on a full time basis  Access to our Talent Development Programme  Great social events with your team and other TNO colleagues  That s how you will get to know a lot of people really quickly  Possibility of a permanent contract  The opportunity to attend courses  workshops and conferences  and to receive training and coaching based on your needs  Travel allowance or a bike Flexible working hours and the possibility of working from home  Networking opportunities and great activities organized by Jong TNO  Great social events with your team and other TNO colleagues  That s how you will get to know a lot of people really quickly  A good pension scheme  Read more about tailoring your benefits package TNO AS AN EMPLOYER At TNO  we innovate for a healthier  safer and more sustainable life  And for a strong economy  Since 1932  we have been making knowledge and technology available for the common good  We find each other in wonder and ingenuity  We are driven to push boundaries  There is all the space and support for your talent and ambition  You work with people who will challenge you  who inspire you and want to learn from you  Our state of the art facilities are there to realize your vision  What you do at TNO matters  impact makes the difference  Because with every innovation you contribute to tomorrow s world  Read more about TNO as an employer THE SELECTION PROCESS The selection process comprises two interview rounds  In a final meeting we will discuss the terms of employment and your tailored benefits package  We aim to finalize the entire process within four weeks  The selection process may include an online assessment and a reference check  In view of the current Corona restrictions  the selection and onboarding processes have been modified  Your invitation for a job interview will detail the relevant information  As you will be working for clients in the domain of defence and security  a Certificate of No Objection issued by AIVD  The Dutch General Information and Security Service  is mandatory  This means you will have to undergo a security screening  Read more about security screening  HAS THIS JOB OPENING SPARKED YOUR INTEREST  Then we d like to hear from you  Please contact us for more information about the job or the selection process  To apply  please upload your CV and covering letter using the  apply now  button  Recruiter  Sandra LemmensMobile phone   31  0 6 23967752LinkedIn  https   www linkedin com in sandralemmens Hiring manager  Marieke Milligen  Versluis  vanPhone number   31 0 88 86 66001 Accept cookies to view this video or embedded content  ACCEPT ALL COOKIES Note that applications via email and third party applications are not taken into consideration

Organization  As our Enterprise Data Governance Advisor  you become part of the central team responsible for steering the Data Governance of ABN AMRO  The team is diverse with regards to culture  experiences and age  The atmosphere is lively and informal  and the environment is safe  Your colleagues are really passioned to bring data under governance to make it easier to use data  Focus is to support the data driven organisation bringing data use to the next level  Data Governance is mean and not a goal   In your day to day work you have a crucial role in facing the most complex data management puzzles head on  and solving them  Next to your day to day work  there is room to design  create and implement new processes especially when you are the one who is suggesting the change for the better   The team you become part of is in constant collaboration with all business lines  international branches and subsidiaries of the bank  We all work together at the frontier of the largest data revolution in the banking industry and with the core value assets of the organization   Position  As our Enterprise Data Governance Advisor  you help realise the delivery of the ABN AMRO strategy  a Personal Bank in a Digital Age  You ensure that the entire bank follows the correct route towards a fully data driven organisation  From shaping new concepts to designing and guiding data management initiatives  You are able to quickly submerge yourself in a brand new initiative  shape  socialise and ensure it is properly anchored for successful execution  You are a Data Management expert able to translate our data vision into reality  How  By creative thinking and being assertive  You identify challenges and based on your experience recommend the best way forward  You have a proven track record in data management and are able to get people  especially senior management  to rally behind the conceptual and complex topics you are working on   Some examples of your responsibilities  Spot external trends and internal drivers for change  Act as a sparring partner for the Heads of Business Data Governance  Maintain and further develop our bank wide Data Management Framework  Identify challenges in executing our Data Strategy and recommend the best way forward  Drive sensitive organisational change topics related to Data Management  Job Requirements  You are a conceptual thinker  but can translate concepts to pragmatic solutions whose behaviour reflects the culture principles of courage  care and collaboration  This is reflected by your eagerness to learn  the questions you dare to ask and the status quo you are willing to challenge  New and tough data management puzzles and jumping into the unknown is what makes you happy  You get even more excited when the only assignment you are given to start with is   please help us figure this one out    You know where to start  how to tackle complex problems  and bring them to a successful result  In doing so  you know how to handle conversations on various management levels to keep everyone informed  and know which information you should present and in what format depending on the stakeholder groups you are dealing with  This is on your resume   Master s degree  Experience in Data Management  strategy   design  Solid track record in implementing Data Management in complex environments  Sparring partner for senior management  Sound knowledge of Data Management  Fluent in English  Dutch is a bonus   Excellent interpersonal and communication skills  Offer  The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have  Care  Collaboration and Courage are our key values  Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures  knowledge and experience  Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation  To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents  we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated  A few examples of our excellent terms of employment   The opportunity to play a key role in the execution of our Data Strategy and room to grow both personally and professionally  A good work life balance  and help on boost your vitality and fitness  A market conform salary of 60 000 to 92 500  based on 36 hours  and an additional benefit budget of 11  with which you can buy flexible terms of employment  Five weeks of holiday per year  A personal development budget of  1000 per year and various internal trainings  A high degree of responsibility and freedom to finish your tasks  Good set of facilities for remote working  Application  Are you interested  Please leave your motivation and your CV behind using te  Solliciteren  button below  If you have any questions about this rol please call me  Stefan van Rumpt   Stefan van Rumpt  31  0  6 46 99 32 72   s v rumpt cmotions nl

Begin jij altijd een beetje te gniffelen als je hoort wat sommige organisaties nog allemaal in Excel doen  Draai jij je hand niet om voor flinke bergen data  en maakt je hart zelfs een klein sprongetje als het gaat over machine learning en voorspellende modellen  Lijkt het je wat om met jouw kennis de meest uiteenlopende organisaties te helpen met het oplossen van complexe data vraagstukken  Lees gauw verder want wie weet is deze job als Data Scientist dan wel geknipt voor jou  Wie zijn wij   Wij zijn Always be learning  Een startende  ambitieuze club van data professionals  Wij weten alles van  hoe kan het ook anders  data  en zijn technisch net zo sterk als we sociaal zijn  Wij geloven in de kracht van een team  maar ook in de schoonheid van het interim werken  Bij ons krijg je een kijkje in de keuken bij de meest uiteenlopende organisaties en projecten  waardoor je in  no time  een CV opbouwt waar je U tegen zegt  En dat alles doe je binnen een startende organisatie waar jouw input wordt gewaardeerd en gestimuleerd  Nieuwe dingen geleerd  Dan delen we dat met elkaar  Successen behaald  Dit wordt gevierd  Met het team van Always be learning  maar ook met onze broertjes  en zusjes van MakerStreet  Cheers  Verder betekent werken bij ons   Een ongekend goede werksfeer en een prachtig kantoor  Een team om mee te sparren en veel meet ups  borrels en andere  vakinhoudelijke  evenementen die je kunt bijwonen en of organiseren  graag zelfs    Een maandelijkse  Think  n Drink  met het team  waarin we de  ins   outs  van het vak met elkaar delen  Een vaste job binnen een organisatie met een start up mentaliteit  Veel ruimte voor nieuwe initiatieven en ideeën  Goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden  zoals volledige reiskostenvergoeding  25 vakantiedagen  pensioenopbouw  een mobiele telefoon en een laptop die je ook privé kunt gebruiken  Een blitse VanMoof smart bike  Een jaarlijks opleidingsbudget van   2 500    onbeperkt toegang tot de trainingen van DataCamp en een plan om je te blijven ontwikkelen dat we samen met jou maken  En natuurlijk een passend salaris  ook als je even niet op project zit  Wie ben jij   Je hebt een afgeronde WO opleiding in een technische  exacte of analytische richting  Je hebt minimaal 3 jaar fulltime werkervaring als Data Scientist  Je bent onderzoekend aangelegd  en geen deurtje blijft ongeopend bij jou  Jij bent niet bang voor wat uitdaging  Sterker nog  hoe groter  hoe beter  Je hebt een sterk ontwikkelde visie op het gebied van data science  Wij worden helemaal enthousiast als je jouw data passie actief deelt met de wereld  Je bent een kei in communicatie  Zowel met collega s als met stakeholders  van vakinhoudelijk tot de vrijdagmiddag borrel  jij staat je mannetje  Dit kan jij   Je hebt ervaring met het gehele spectrum van data science  van het verzamelen van ongestructureerde data in een database tot aan het omzetten hiervan in algoritmes en dashboards  om zo tot waardevolle inzichten te komen  Python en R hebben geen geheimen voor jou Je hebt ruime ervaring met het opzetten van relationele en niet relationele databases en kan datamining technieken inzetten om complexe verbanden en patronen in big data te ontdekken  In de afgelopen jaren heb je bij verschillende projecten advanced analytics algorithms ontwikkeld of toegepast zoals  predictive modeling  clustering  NLP of computer vision technieken  Je hebt ervaring met data visualisatie tools zoals bijvoorbeeld Tableau  Microsoft Power BI of Qlik  Je bent een sparringpartner voor de business en weet hoe je data science kan inzetten om business kansen te creëren  Nog steeds enthousiast na het lezen van bovenstaande info  Dat dacht ik  Solliciteer gauw op deze verdraaid leuke data job en wie weet zien we je snel  Eerst nog wat vragen  Mail dan naar giorgia alwaysbelearning nl  bel Giorgia via  31 6 1045 6559 of stuur direct een WhatsApp door hier te klikken      Please note  Due to the nature of this job only applicants who are living in the Netherlands and speak Dutch will be taken into consideration

Functieomschrijving  Wil jij werken bij hét toonaangevende IT  en Telecombedrijf voor het MKB in Nederland en voel jij je thuis in het operationele hart van een organisatie  Vind jij het een sport om data dusdanig in te zetten dat het hele bedrijf er profijt van heeft   Dan hebben wij een prachtige functie voor je als Proces   Data Analist bij WilroffReitsma   Als Proces   Data Analist ben je het aanspreekpunt van onze organisatie voor alles wat met informatievoorziening te maken heeft  Je maakt uit een grote brei van informatie duidelijke inzichten voor verschillende afdelingen  Denk aan het MT voor de dagelijkse sturing  maar bijvoorbeeld ook aan de Marketing Manager voor het optimaal inzetten van onze data t b v  campagnes   Je werkt aan de huidige data bronnen en onderzoekt de mogelijkheden waarop deze aan elkaar kunnen worden gekoppeld  Jij zorgt ervoor dat data uit deze bronnen worden omgezet in een bruikbaar datamodel en optimaliseert deze   Je houdt je bovendien bezig met het continu verbeteren van processen van onze dienstverlening  Zo ben jij de spin in het web en overzie je meerdere processen   Jij bent  Toe aan een tweede of derde stap in jouw carrière  Geïnteresseerd in technologie  communicatie  ICT en telecom  Leergierig  altijd op zoek naar nieuwe kennis om jezelf te verbeteren  Analytisch  jij kunt complexe zaken accuraat op een simpele en klantgerichte manier uitleggen  Pro actief  je wacht niet af  maar je spot zelfstandig kansen en pakt deze op  Een procesmatige denker  Ervaren met databases zowel gestructureerd  SQL  als ongestructureerd  NoSQL   Ervaren MS SQL  T SQL  en bekend met het maken van data marts  Bedreven in het maken van duidelijke rapportages en dashboards in PowerBI  In het bezit van een HBO WO diploma in b v  bedrijfseconomie of MER  Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taalWat jij gaat doen  Inventariseren en analyseren van de informatiebehoefte Het verzamelen en ordenen van gegevens Controleren van gegevens op correctheid Nader onderzoeken van informatiebronnen en verrichten van kwalitatief en kwantitatief onderzoek  Vervaardigen van data analyses en datamodellen Opstellen van rapportages Het adviseren van directie en of het management over de onderzoeks  en analyse resultaten  Het doorgronden  vastleggen en verbeteren van processen Het opstellen van bedrijfsbrede impactanalyses Signaleren van risico s  knelpunten en afwijkingenJij krijgt  Een goed salaris en uitstekende secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden  Een tijdelijk contract met intentie tot een vaste aanstelling  Ruimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling  groei en initiatief  Standplaats in Amersfoort of Halfweg  In overleg mogelijkheden tot thuiswerken Over WilroffReitsma  WilroffReitsma is een jonge  dynamische organisatie en belangrijke speler in de zakelijke IT   Telecomwereld  WilroffReitsma maakt het simpel  Dat wil zeggen  wij ontzorgen onze klanten in het MKB op het gebied van IT   Telecom zodat onze klanten kunnen doen waar ze goed in zijn  ondernemen   Verspreid over twee moderne kantoren in Halfweg en Amersfoort is WilroffReitsma bieden we je een bijzonder een enorm goede werksfeer  inclusief de altijd gezellige borrels  toffe feesten en uitjes  En dan zwijgen we nog over onze kantines met pooltafel  tafelvoetbaltafel  ingebouwde bar en bioscoop   Kom in contact   We horen je denken  sign me up  Stuur jouw motivatie en CV naar ons toe  jouw collega s zitten namelijk te popelen om jou te spreken en jou uit te nodigen voor een goed gesprek en een kop koffie om nader kennis te maken   Reageren kan op hr wilroffreitsma nl t a v  Tamara Mell  Heb je vragen over deze vacature  dan kun je contact opnemen met Etienne van Rijn   31 651411992   Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld

Data zijn voor bedrijven één  test  van de key resources  Het wordt tijd dat hier serieus werk van wordt gemaakt  Maar hoe doe je dat  Jij maakt als business analist data grote impact bij klanten met het antwoord op deze vraag  zodat zij kunnen versnellen en klaar zijn voor de toekomst  Geen data omgeving is voor jou te complex  Jij loopt prettig voorop en stippelt alvast de route uit  Wat vragen wij van jou  Je bent zowel strategisch als technisch  Je zit vaak zelf aan de knoppen en kan ook ontwikkelaars en architecten briefen  Dit is je andere grote talent  goede gesprekken voeren  Met klanten  gebruikers en techneuten   in SCRUM team s  en met collega s door heel Nederland met allerlei expertises op datagebied  Daarnaast heb je   minimaal een hbo diploma  minstens 5 jaar ervaring als data modelleur  data engineer of data expert bij een IT dienstverlener of een grote datafabriek  zoals het Kadaster  actuele kennis van Domain Driven Design  DDD  en Event Driven Systems

citizenM is a global lifestyle hotel company involved in the full spectrum of the customer journey  from sourcing a potential reservation  to checking in and staying in the hotel  to the design and development of our hotels  This degree of vertical integration is unique in the industry  This gives us an incredibly rich dataset to collect  transform  and analyze in order to improve the effectiveness of the operating model and therefore guest experience  Much of this data is combined in citizenM s data platform  If data to you is like a bee to honey then we have the honey pot for you purpose As a data analyst on the hotel operations domain you will have the opportunity to work citizenM s rich data sources  You will be preparing dashboards and performing in depth analysis to provide insights in the operational activities around our hotels so that we can smoothen our operations and optimize our guest experience  This role is part of the Business Intelligence Team  where you will be working closely with all functions in the team to transform data into wisdom for different disciplines within citizenM  As part of this role you will collaborate closely with the  hotel  operations team  key responsibilities  leading consumer insight initiatives in an agile way together with all relevant business units  develop dashboards in PowerBI which allow relevant teams to generate insights and track performance around operational hotel initiatives such as food   beverage  housekeeping and guest satisfaction  identify the requests for operational insights and separate the nice to knows from the need to knows  translate these requests into valid research questions  work with big data sets in our data platform to generate the required insights you are able to translate these outcomes into useful insights and to prepare proposals for metrics and solutions  you will apply different data visualization and storytelling techniques in order to convey the message  in this role you should have a curious mind and will analyze data proactively in order to propose areas in need for insights and in order to seize business opportunities  since you will work closely with the core business units you should understand what is happening at citizenM and be able to develop a strong network across several layers within the organization  qualifications   skills a genuine passion for data and the ability to combine analytical data skills with business knowledge  a bachelor  masters preferred  degree  preferably in the field of data analytics  data science or business analytics  proven proficiency in the use of PowerBI  understanding of relational modeling and relational databases  mainly SQL   affinity with a statistical  data science  programming language for advanced analytics  such as R or Python  attention to detail and a creative mindset  ability to succeed in both collaborative and independent work environments  strong communication skills   both written and oral   in order to convey complex analytical results clearly  you re eager to understand and learn about operational processes and the data that is generated through these processes  experience with Agile way of working  locations   hours Voorschoten Support office  Hybrid working is possible  not fully remote  This is a full time position  citizenM is an affordable luxury hotel chain for mobile citizens of the world  With style that will knock your socks off  we offer citizens a real home from home  plus the world s fluffiest pillows  Our typical guest is a frequent traveler who is quality and design driven  and value conscious  We currently have hotels in the Netherlands  France  UK  Switzerland  Denmark  USA and Asia  with more to come soon  We are proud to put hospitality back into the hospitality industry  and have received numerous awards for our groundbreaking approach  We like to do things differently  This means our hotels are not traditional  and neither are our support offices  We re open minded  with kind hearts and global minds  citizenM loves diversity  We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from anyone   AS  LI Hybrid

As a Data Scientist you ll delight our clients by transforming giant  complex datasets to awesome and relevant insights  You re resourceful in finding additional data sources and recoding variables  You don t just try to understand the past  you predict the future  You have knowledge of and experience with applying machine learning in a practical setting  where you ll turn a good model into a great one  You communicate and present results convincingly  to create real and lasting impact  What s in it for you   On top of excellent employment conditions  working at IG H will kickstart your You will be assigned involved coaches  who will be there for you to provide you with guidance  Next to that  IG H offers you an inspiring office in Utrecht  an unparalleled good working atmosphere  and abundant parties  team activities and sporting events    The most beautiful thing about consulting is the diversity within the projects  IG H offers next to different clients  a variety in the types of assignments  One assignment could be very strategic  in which yououtline the direction of a company  Whereas another assignment could be focused on implementation  in which you are working together with the client to deliver concrete results   Peter Hardy  Manager  Why IG H   IG H is transforming leading companies across the Health  Retail and Finance sectors  Together with our world class technology partners  we help our clients move forward and stay relevant  With insightful advice  great design and unrivalled digital platforms  Our exceptional results come from successfully aligning people  business and technology  With over 300 talented colleagues on board  people who genuinely embrace change and challenges  we ve created a unique high daring  high caring culture  Attracting extraordinary people and inspiring them to push the boundaries for themselves and our clients  What you bring MSc degree At least 2 years of relevant work experience within a consulting  type  environment Analytical  inventive and practical Python and or R skills You have a top sport mentality  we are looking for talent that continuously wants to be better What we offer you Working at a Great Place to Work with a pleasant atmosphere and enthusiastic colleagues who support you  The chance to make a real contribution to the ongoing domestic and international growth of IG H  We offer a permanent  indefinite  contract right away  Excellent salary and working benefits  company car   good mobility scheme  Generous bonus scheme  25 holiday days with the possibility to take up more  The possibility to take a sabbatical after 3 years of employment  and more  which we would love to elaborate on  Now   are you excited   If this vacancy is right for you  then this is a great place to work with super happy employees and clients  NPS   60   On top of that  we re hitting double digit growth and have our sights firmly set on continued international expansion  We re still just embarking on this exciting adventure   For more information please contact one of our recruiters Jesse Albus jesse albus igh com 06 18745743  You can also apply directly via the apply button  Hope to meet you soon   We want our employees to reflect the diversity of society  We work together with a remarkable mix of talents  personalities and cultures  IG H is proud to be an equal opportunity employer  All qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to national origin  race  religion  gender  gender identity or expression  sexual orientation  genetics  disability or age  We care about individuality  but most importantly  we share the pride of our collective achievements and a Great Place to Work

Position Overview  Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent s rapid global growth with future ready  global IT platforms  applications  and services  We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy  architecture  roadmap  and execution  Satisfying our internal external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations   Compliance and Security of Overseas IT focus on building a secured and compliant infrastructure to provide our game studios  Our team will partner with Cloud Center of Excellence  Cybersecurity Legal  Privacy office  and different Business Group to deliver the best cloud and on premises solution   We are seeking a Data Privacy Lead to support the evolution of the Compliance and Security Program  This role will drive Data Privacy practices and provide guidance in identifying global compliance risks  help implement and maintain compliance processes and documentation  In addition  enable our team to implement a GRC tool  focusing on tracking with the Legal team to comply with different local regulations  Finally help build foundation and support our internal and external audits   Duties and Responsibilities  This role will work closely with our internal IT and Tencent cloud product teams  as well as our game studios to build the best Data Privacy program within the Compliance and Security Organization  This role will be responsible for leading IT Risk Analysts to align our processes and best practices over Governance  Risk  and Compliance  Building cross team processes and providing support to build metrics to measure accomplishment and milestones   The scope includes establishing relationships with different teams and building a Security Trust Center to better enable our internal customers to improve their Cybersecurity and Privacy posture  Implement a GRC tool  Improve overseas IT Compliance and Security programs by assessing and recording risks  working with Security engineers to manage technical risks  and providing enablement support for internal and external audits  Collaborate with the Legal and Privacy team to adjust our processes to comply with local regulations   Who we are looking for Self motivated  articulate  passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction Love satisfying customers with state of the art cloud solutions  realizing ideas  building services  and unlocking the potential of new technology  Collaborative  independent  insistent  flexible  and open minded  And you see no conflict in any of these things Knowledgeable  resourceful  and show initiative  You always keep the customer s objectives in mind Positive by nature  a great team player  and both dependable and autonomous Customer oriented  and could work at a
